   - The pattern seems to repeat every 20 rows, which matches the grid's dimensions.

   - In the second row, the '✅' is at the 5th position.
   - This pattern continues, with the '✅' moving one position to the right in each subsequent row.
   - When the '✅' reaches the end of a row, it wraps around to the beginning of the next row.
